snippet: Lori Berenson, an American who has completed a 20-year sentence for aiding a rebel group that planned to take members of Peru’s Congress hostage, could be deported as early as Wednesday.
abstract: Peru officials say American activist Lori Berenson has completed 20-year sentence for aiding rebels, and will be deported soon.

byline.original: By ANDREA ZARATE and WILLIAM NEUMAN
byline.contributor: Andrea Zarate reported from Lima, and William Neuman from Caracas, Venezuela.

lead_paragraph: Lori Berenson, an American who has completed a 20-year sentence for aiding a rebel group that planned to take members of Peru’s Congress hostage, could be deported as early as Wednesday.

headline.main: American Convicted in Peru Plot Plans to Return to U.S.
headline.print_headline: American Convicted in Peru Plot Plans to Return to U.S.
